name: Hackstar: The End
description:
You are in a Tantive IV with a software called HaxPlus, and you go on a mission to destroy the Deathstar. In order to destroy the Deathstar you have to divert power to HaxPlus. After you divert power to HaxPlus you can initialize the hack to destroy the Deathstar.

Hope you like my game!

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Rotate/Interact
